column1: Use the code for FREE but leave this message intact.

<BODY   LEFTMARGIN="0" MARGINWIDTH="0" MARGINHEIGHT="0"  BACKGROUND="/notebook/defaultimages/newback.gif" BGCOLOR="#ffffff" TEXT="#000000" LINK="#ff0000" VLINK="#800000" ALINK="#ffff80">
<BODY   LEFTMARGIN="0" MarginTop=0 MARGINWIDTH="0" MARGINHEIGHT="0"  Margin="no" margins="0"
A comprehensive package for the hands-on teaching of Molecular Biology.
MBN Updates: here are the updates to the MBN software. Free to download if you already own MBN on CD-ROM
Samples: here are some extra samples we have prepared for you to use in BioLab
• BioLab version 2: full of new features and enhancements
• can now work with VERY long sequences (up to 2000 million bp)
• the tube "information pop up" and "check seqs" now work on any tube, even within methods
• the long awaited "lambda protocole" as presented by Roger Delpech from SAPS
<li>diagnosis of Cystic Fibrosis using PCR (from an original research paper)

Use the "Download Wizard" to obtain the update to MBN, or order the Network update*. By answering a few questions you will help us determine which version of MBN you need and give you the most relevant installation instructions.
The information gathered is stored only temporarily until your registration is processed. E-mail addresses are not passed on to third parties.

column2:
>

* The Update to the Network version is not yet available but you can use the wizard to let us know you need it and we will send you an email as soon as it is ready.

Note: the email address mbn.online@bbsrc.ac.uk is no longer valid. If you need help for MBN, please subscribe to molecular-biology-notebook forum. Thank you
